contextual_notes: The user is focused on ensuring comprehensive care for their father, which is a complex and emotionally charged task.

general_insights: Providing clear, structured guidance can help users articulate complex needs.
Reassurance and empathy are crucial when users are dealing with emotionally charged decisions.
Maintaining a consistent and supportive tone can help improve user satisfaction over time.
